properties.verseOrder: i1 c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 e1

verse.name: i1
verse.lines:
Kongoi mising Cheptalel Kwandanyo
(Kongoi mising (haiya haiya)
kongoi missing kiptayanyo). x2

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
(Kongoi we kongoi cheptalel
(kongoi)
Kongoi we Baba kongoi mising). x2
(Twakushukuru Mungu,
maana we u mwema
kongoi we Baba kongoi
mising. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Wakati wa majonzi,
wewe ndiwe tulizo
wakati wa hasira
wewe ni burudisho (hakika)
wakati wote Baba
wewe ni tegemeo.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Giza likitokea wewe
ndiwe mwangaza,
magonjwa yakijiri
wewe ndiwe tabibu,
wakati wote Baba
wewe ni tegemeo.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Adui zangu wote
umewaaibisha,
japo ni wengi sana
kama nywele za kichwa,
wakati wote Baba
wewe ni tegemeo.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Wakati waâ€“ njaa
wewe ni msaada
wajane mayatima
wewe unawalinda wote.

verse.name: e1
verse.lines:
Kongoi mising
Cheptalel Kwandanyo
(Kongoi mising (haiya haiya)
kongoi missing kiptayanyo). x2
